column1: Something wrong while deleting your account. Please contact the store owner.
column2: Nekaj je narobe pri brisanju računa. Obrnite se na lastnika trgovine.

column1: You will go to our homepage in 5 seconds.
column2: Vrnili se boste na našo domačo stran v 5 sekundah.

column1: Are you sure you want to delete your account?
column2: Ali ste prepričani, da želite izbrisati svoj račun?

column1: The message will be shown on Delete Account area. HTML code is allowed.
column2: Sporočilo bo prikazano na območju Izbriši račun. HTML koda je dovoljena.
